name: Deep Space Survivor
description:
Can you survive the onslaught of enemy ships in this top-down space auto-shooter?

In Deep Space Survivor, you try to survive the numerous enemy space ships that are trying to get you, blowing them up with unique weapons and powerups. Influenced by Vampire Survivors and Magic Survival, this game provides tons of action and roguelike elements.

The game is a survival game with minimalistic gameplay controls and roguelite mechanics. You only have to use the arrow keys (or WASD) to control your space ship around the game level.

You can purchase various unique weapons that fire automatically and that can be upgraded several times, sometimes with new features.

Development / Early Access

Please note that the game is still in development! We have a roadmap that includes a ton of new content (weapons, enemy ship designs, levels, talents etc) Follow the Itch.io devlog for more information regarding progress and roadmap.
